Proudly headquartered in Angola, VOE has experienced exponential growth over the years, offering tailored solutions for the Oil and Energy Market. Our best-in-class services, championed by a committed team of industry professionals.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1689677265705{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;border-left-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”8207″ img_size=”medium”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”NAMIBIA” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Namibia, home to awe-inspiring landscapes and ancient traditions, has a population of around 2.53 million people. We aim to leave a lasting legacy of prosperity by creating employment opportunities and supporting socio-economic growth throughout Namibia. Deeply committed to unlocking Namibia’s energy potential.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”10″][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1689677289231{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;border-left-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #f4f4f4 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;border-radius: 1px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”8208″ img_size=”medium”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”USA” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]The USA is a global powerhouse, embodying ambition, innovation, and diverse opportunities for its citizens.
